full_summary:
# 5P315-230276 Telescopic Boom Cylinder

### Public Notice

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to participate in the RFP process for the supply and delivery of 5P315-230276 Telescopic Boom Cylinders to Parks Canada Agency (PC) for Ontario Waterways, Rideau Canal.

### Description of the Project

This procurement involves the supply and delivery of (14) "Type A" and (14) "Type B" telescopic boom cylinders, totaling twenty-eight (28) units. The delivery deadline is March 31, 2025.

### Request for Proposal

The requirements for this project are outlined in the full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments, which can only be accessed and downloaded upon logging into your SAP Ariba account and completing your Government of Canada profile.

### Important Details

*   Tender Closing Date: June 19, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST.
*   Amendments to this RFP will be posted in the Event Messages board in SAP Ariba.
*   Contact information for the contracting authority: Ms. Vashti Ramnarine, Ramnarine.Vashti@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, Tel: 289-772-7284.

### RFP Documents

*   The RFP can only be accessed and downloaded from the SAP Ariba account.
*   Online registration is required prior to downloading any documents.
*   The vendor must register in the Government of Canada's Supplier Registration SaveTime Program.

### ISO 27001 Compensation

Note-This is not a requirement or representation and its posting or removal is not a false statement.

### Language and Contract Method

The RFP is available in English and French. The contract language is English, but other languages may be supported if the vendor is able to go without any level of assistance.

### Goods and Services Classification

Supply and Delivery of Telescopic Boom Cylinders.

### Customs Documents
